title: flowMetadata
description: Schema for storing metadata about a Flow in Yogis

flowName.description: Original name of the flow in Sanskrit or English

level.description: Level of difficulty for the flow

numberOfPoses.description: Total number of poses in this flow (must equal length of the poses array)

recommendedRounds.description: How many times to repeat the full sequence

poses.description: Ordered list of the poses in this flow
